context.description: Context - client defined, can be used for debugging.

timeToDecryptMillis.description: UTDs can be permanent or temporary. If temporary, this field will contain the time it took to decrypt the message in milliseconds. If permanent should be -1

cryptoSDK.description: Which crypto backend is the client currently using.

oneOf.description: Legacy crypto backend specific to each platform.
Cross-platform crypto backend written in Rust.

cryptoModule.description: DEPRECATED: Which crypto module is the client currently using.

oneOf.description: Native / legacy crypto module specific to each platform.
Shared / cross-platform crypto module written in Rust.
